title: The Writer's Almanac - Saturday, December 19, 2020
description: It's the birthday of French singer Édith Piaf (1915-1963), who was raised by prostitutes in a brothel before becoming an international star.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of French singer Édith Piaf (1915-1963), who was raised by prostitutes in a brothel before becoming an international star.
